title: FS: Pair Of T206 HOFers HAND CUT From Sheet - Priced Individually
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: Pair Of T206 HOFers HAND CUT From Sheet - Priced Individually
posts.post_content:
Hugh Duffy Tolstoi

Incredible angular cut that measures nearly 1 3/4 inches at the bottom of the card. This card, front and back, are in just tremendous condition. Got the authentic grade from SGC due to having been hand cut from a sheet. 

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains109/duffy_zpszwbkummx.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains113/duffy_zpsnm19spbz.jpg[/IMG]

Asking $650 for the Duffy

Elmer Flick Piedmont

Huge card side to side, measures 1 11/16" at the middle. This card has also been hand cut from a sheet, with an unmistakable bow cut on the larger size border. Again graded as authentic by SGC due to having been hand cut. Front and back are super clean.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains108/5d67950c-3f41-4b2d-b6d8-b103f3fa784c_zps712gqbsw.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains113/acf33a81-0640-4bbb-acb8-0e32a1b2f8c0_zpspzqepip9.jpg[/IMG]


Asking $350 for the Flick

Tom C
Do you have an asking price on the Duffy?

Dan,

I am taking offers on them. The price history of HOF T206 hand cuts is...well...sparse as you can imagine. The Duffy is the far more dramatic cut and is in better condition overall, so I would expect to get a fair amount more for that one.

As with anything, they are worth what someone is willing to pay. If the offers that come in are lower than I think is justified I will hold them for a bit or perhaps look to an auction house.

Tom C

Duffy looks like he has a hangnail =)

Awesome and clean card !!

Step #1 Crack em
Step #2 "Clean" em
Step #3 Submit to "another 3 letter grading company"
Step #4 Profit on your "new" 8's!!

Matt

are very reasonably priced Tom:)..........they are definite scrap......if they had errors on them, they would be fetching triple the amount at least...

duffy is sick!:eek:..........................

these were definitely obviously hand cut from a scrap sheet
